definition: Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Real Madrid defender Gabriel Heinze has conceded he would be interested in playing Premier League football again.
sentences.chinese: 皇馬後衛海因策已經承認他可以再次享受英超足球。

sentences.english: Liverpool are trying to thrash out a deal with Real Madrid to land Ruud van Nistelrooy on a six-month loan next week.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦正在嘗試與皇馬討論下個星期租借範尼六個月。

sentences.english: I think this year can be a good year for Real Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得本賽季皇馬一定可以收穫頗豐。

sentences.english: "I know Real Madrid were hovering and so were Benfica, " Ferguson said.
sentences.chinese: “我知道皇馬和本菲卡都有興趣，”弗格森說。

sentences.english: Real Madrid coach Fabio Capello wants a reunion with France international defender Jonathan Zebina.
sentences.chinese: 皇馬主教練卡佩羅希望有法國國腳澤比納重聚博納污。

sentences.english: Pardeza did rubbish claims that Rafa Benitez was deliberately stalling when it came to negotiations with Real.
sentences.chinese: 帕德薩再次重複表示貝尼特斯故意拖延與皇馬的談判。

sentences.english: But still it was all about Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 但是，所有的事情，還是圍着皇馬轉。

sentences.english: That Ronaldo is utterly essential to Real’s chances is unquestionable.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，羅納爾多對皇馬是不可或缺的。

sentences.english: He broke the habit of a lifetime yesterday when he congratulated them for thrashing Real Madrid but quickly reverted to type.
sentences.chinese: 昨天他破了一會例，讚揚他們將皇馬橫掃出局。

sentences.english: Fiorentina have made a bid for Real Madrid left-back Royston Drenthe.
sentences.chinese: 佛羅倫薩象皇馬的左後衛提出了報價。

sentences.english: He has regained his starting position with Real Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 他已重新獲得皇馬的正選席位。

sentences.english: Barcelona are becoming obsessed with and terrified by Madrid and Mourinho.
sentences.chinese: 巴薩被皇馬和穆里尼奧盯得心裏發毛。

sentences.english: It has been several years since Real Madrid have played in the quarterfinals of the Champions League.
sentences.chinese: 皇馬已經有好幾年沒能打進歐冠的四分之一決賽了。

sentences.english: As a result, Madrid are looking at Chivu, their second-choice.
sentences.chinese: 結果皇馬只能盯上齊沃，他們的第二選擇。

sentences.english: Mesut Ozil has not been in great form for Real Madrid recently.
sentences.chinese: 厄齊爾最近在皇馬狀態不佳。

sentences.english: Only striker Raul Gonzalez has been at Madrid longer than Guti.
sentences.chinese: 只有勞爾在皇馬效力的時間比古蒂長。

definition: Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
